amendment.description: Amendment requires a report to Congress from the Director of Central Intelligence describing all activities of the intelligence community with respect to certain events in the Republic of Chile including the assassination of President Allende, the accession of General Pinochet, and the violations of human rights committed by officers or agents of former President Pinochet. \ As amended by the Goss amendment (A005) a requirement for the CIA to produce certain documentation as part of the report was deleted.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 and printed in the Congressional Record to require a report from the Director of Central Intelligence describing all activities of the intelligence community in the Republic of Chile with respect to the assassination of President Allende, the accession of General Pinochet, and the violations of human rights committed by officers or agents of former President Pinochet.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A004) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
